title: Сокровища императора
overview: As part of the new show, pairs of participants embark on a Great Chinese Adventure. During the month, they will have to travel around the region and complete various tasks at speed, which they will receive in each episode of the show. The winner will be the one who comes to the final point first.Participants will be tested for time, intelligence and endurance. However, the main condition is to show maximum human qualities in the pursuit of Treasure, making the right choice and making the right decisions. 13 couples will participate in the project. In each episode, one will leave the show.
